word_mean: 机械学，力学：研究物体运动的科学，包括运动学、动力学和静力学

sentence.Network_en: The mechanics of the job, however, have changed little since then.
sentence.Network_cn: 不过，工作流程从那以后就几乎没有任何变化。

sentence.Network_en: The mechanics work hard to keep the he-licopters airworthy.
sentence.Network_cn: 机修工努力维持直升机的飞行性能。

sentence.Network_en: Both quantum mechanics and chaos theory suggest a world constantly in flux.
sentence.Network_cn: 量子力学和混沌理论都表明世界永远处于不断变化中。

entry.tran: （尤指修理汽车的）技工，机修工，修理工
entry.def: A mechanic is someone whose job is to repair and maintain machines and engines, especially car engines.

example.ex: If you smell gas fumes or burning, take the car to your mechanic...
example.tran: 如果你闻见汽油冒烟或燃烧的异味，应把车送修。

example.ex: An elevator mechanic can work the machinery directly by turning this lever.
example.tran: 电梯修理工可以转动这根杠杆直接操作机器。

entry.tran: （过程、系统、动作等）运作方式;(具体的)方法，技巧
entry.def: The mechanics of a process, system, or activity are the way in which it works or the way in which it is done.

example.ex: What are the mechanics of this new process?...
The mechanics of the job, however, have changed little since then.
example.tran: 不过，工作流程从那以后就几乎没有任何变化。

entry.def: Mechanics is the part of physics that deals with the natural forces that act on moving or stationary objects.

example.ex: ...the other great theory of 20th-century physics, quantum mechanics...
example.tran: 20世纪物理学的另一个伟大理论——量子力学

example.ex: He has not studied mechanics or engineering.
example.tran: 他没有学习过力学和工程学。

means.word_mean: 1. the branch of physics concerned with the motion of bodies in a frame of reference
2. the technical aspects of doing something;

auth_sentence.content: You seem to be mis-quoting physicists on quantum mechanics.

Sentence.sentence: It involves the crude mechanics of writing, but in its economy, spontaneity and even vulgarity.
Throughout the body of the speech, Juan dealt only with the basic mechanics of the earthquakes and carefully avoid technical terms.

sentences.en: This is a course in mechanics.
The mechanics of the machine are very old.
sentences.cn: 这台机器的机件非常老。

sentences.en: The mechanics of fixing a car are very long.
sentences.cn: 修理一部汽车的过程很长。
他们都想到了一些方法。
